ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] The boat to Kunark
ygData.msgSnippet: If you are able to get to Oasis, you should be able to take the Raft to TD to Ogre Island and pick up the boat from ogre Island to OT.  Keep inmind if you are
ygData.messageBody:
If you are able to get to Oasis, you should be able to
take the Raft to TD to Ogre Island and pick up the boat
from ogre Island to OT. Keep inmind if you are KoS at
the Outpost where the boat docks you will need to swim
to shore once the boat Zones in.

just a little help that you might like to help you get
to Kunark the old fasioed slow way.


Cynfyn MacCulloch 51 DESK
> The other day I decided that a trip to Kunark was in order for my
> druid. I will be needing Brute hides, and so was ready to go and hunt
> them. However, the shuttles in Butcherblock never met the boat. I
> tried three times, three different shuttles, and they went out to
> Timerous Deep, got close to the boat, then the boat left. The
> shuttles just went back to BB.
>
> That avenue being out, I returned to SK to pick off gnolls, and
> forage Plains Pebbles. I almost have my bank tool box full of them.
> have about eight to go. So, decided to stay there until I get the
> rest.
>
> Plus I have been getting fs weapons from the gnolls, which I have
> tried to make into another Vale Sewing Kit to sell.
>
> Hope they get the boat fixed. For my first trip I want to do it the
> old-fashioned way.
>
> Barto Proudfoot
>
>
